siteMetadata.title: Blog by Aslı Sabancı
siteMetadata.subtitle: Atoms with consciousness, matter with curiosity

frontmatter.title: Generating random Turkish first names with a super basic RNN
frontmatter.description: Inspired by the mini 'Dinosaur name generator' project I did a while ago, I wanted to re-use the core code (with some modifications and refactorings of my own) and try to generate Turkish first names. The project was about building a simple recurrent neural network using numpy and it was a part of the Sequence Models course of Andrew Ng's awesome Deep Learning Specialization series on Coursera.
